00032     ~MechanicsModel() {
00033       set<MechanicsMaterial *> UNIQUEmaterials;
00034       for (uint i = 0; i < _materials.size(); i++) 
00035     UNIQUEmaterials.insert(_materials[i]);
00036     
00037       for (set<MechanicsMaterial *>::iterator it = UNIQUEmaterials.begin();
00038        it != UNIQUEmaterials.end(); it++) 
00039         delete (*it);
00040     };

00045     // From constant value
00046     void initializeField(const Real value = 1.0) {
00047       const uint numNodes = _myMesh->getNumberOfNodes();
00048       const uint dim = _myMesh->getDimension();
00049 
00050       for (uint i = 0; i < numNodes; i++) 
00051     for (uint j = 0; j < dim; j++)
00052       _field[i*dim+j] = _myMesh->getX(i,j)*value; // value = isotropic expansion/shrinking
00053     };
00054 
00056     void initializeField(const Real* value) {
00057       _field.assign(value, value+_field.size());
00058     };
00059 
00061     void linearizedUpdate(const Real* localValues, Real fact) {
00062       const int nLocalDof = (_myMesh->getNumberOfNodes())*_nodeDoF;
00063       for(uint i = 0; i < nLocalDof; i++)
00064     _field[i] += fact*localValues[i];
00065     };
00066 
00067     // One value at the time (Node ID, dof index, value)
00068     void linearizedUpdate(const int id, const int dof, const Real value) {
00069       // const uint dim = _myMesh->getDimension();
00070       // assert( id < _field.size() && dof < dim );
00071       _field[id*_nodeDoF + dof] += value;
00072     }
00073 
00074     // One value at the time (Node ID, dof index, value)
00075     void linearizedUpdate(const int dof, const Real value) {
00076       _field[dof] += value;
00077     }
00078     
00079     void setField(uint dof, Real value) {
00080       _field[dof] = value;
00081     }
00082     void setField(const Real* value) {
00083       _field.assign(value, value+_field.size());

00086     void getField(vector<double> & x) {

00095     void printField() {
00096       int i = 0;
00097       while (i < _field.size()) {
00098     for (uint j = 0; j < _nodeDoF; j++) {
00099       cout << _field[i] << " ";
00100       i++;
00101     }
00102     cout << endl;
00103       }
00104     }
00105 
00106     void writeField(string OutputFile, int step) {
00107       // Create outputFile name
00108       stringstream FileNameStream;
00109       FileNameStream << OutputFile << step << ".dat";
00110       ofstream out;
00111       out.open( (FileNameStream.str()).c_str() );
00112   
00113       out << _field.size() << endl;
00114       for (uint i = 0; i < _field.size(); i++) {
00115     out << setprecision(15) << _field[i] << endl;
00116       }
00117       out.close();
00118     }

00120     uint getNumMat() {
00121       set<MechanicsMaterial *> UNIQUEmaterials;
00122       for (uint i = 0; i < _materials.size(); i++) 
00123     UNIQUEmaterials.insert(_materials[i]);
00124     
00125       return UNIQUEmaterials.size();
00126     }
00127 
00128     uint getTotNumMatProp() {
00129       set<MechanicsMaterial *> UNIQUEmaterials;
00130       for (uint i = 0; i < _materials.size(); i++) 
00131     UNIQUEmaterials.insert(_materials[i]);
00132     
00133       return ( UNIQUEmaterials.size() * (_materials[0]->getMaterialParameters()).size() );
00134     }
